head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGMAN, RUTH FEINBERG

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERGMAN, RUTH FEINBERG

block.p: BERGMAN-Ruth Feinberg. On Dec. 30, 1999. Beloved wife of the late Irving Bergman. Devoted mother of Julian and Marcia, James, Jessica and Maury Honig, and Peter. Dear sister of the Honorable Robert J. and Laurie Feinberg. Cherished daughter of the late Senator Benjamin and Leah Feinberg. Former Majority Leader of the New York State Senate and Chairman of the New York State Public Service Commission under Governor Thomas E. Dewey. Loving grandmother of Stacey and George Mirza, and Erica. Family services to be held in Plattsburgh, New York.
